title: Are Chicago Students Suffering With or From Teachers Unions?
sub_head: Windy City labor bosses among lockdown bitter-enders.
body:
Just a couple of years too late, even much of the media class is starting to comprehend how destructive pandemic lockdowns have been, especially for children. But the teachers union in one of America’s largest cities remains unwilling to prioritize education during the latest pandemic panic.
The Journal’s Joe Barrett reports:
